PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-10792010-08-20,  ,  HRSD,  , 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to modify the definition of "student loan" in order to more accurately represent the Government of Canada's level of liability by excluding all risk-shared loans from the calculation of aggregate outstanding student loans.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0188 Publication Date: 2010-09-01
AttachmentsAttachment
